column4: well, in 11 days karmic will be out, and I believe that includes 2.6.31, otherwise you could build your own if you're feeling adventurous
yes, there is, 2.6.31 is the latest one released though
no, there is no kernel package for 2.6.30 out (for jaunty anyway)
yes, I said a few lines ago, ubuntu karmic has a package from 2.6.31
